Script for Satan

Room 3 – studio inside

Debra: I hope he doesn't expect breakfast.
Debra: What's going on?
[SATA1] Satan: SURPRISE!
Debra: Finally! It's God! And just in time!
Debra: Oh..no.
[SATA2] Satan: Okay, Okay, you got my attention.
Debra: Yeeaaah.
[SATA3] Satan: Wait...
[SATA4] Satan: Were you trying to God's attention?
[SATA5] Satan: HAHAHAHAHA!!
[SATA6] Satan: That's hilarious!
[SATA7] Satan: What were you thinking exactly?
Debra: I was thinking I need to save my love Timothy.
Debra: He's lost.
Debra: Do you know where he is?
[SATA8] Satan: I don't know where he is. I don't keep tabs on every soul.
Debra: God was supposed to come, so I could ask him for help.
[SATA9] Satan: Shut up for a second.
[SATA10] Satan: I was going to turn you into a worm, but I kinda like where this is going.
[SATA11] Satan: I'll tell you what? You finish up the 10, and I'll take you to God personally.
Debra: Promise?
[SATA12] Satan: Sure.
Debra: Okay. I don't know what else to do.
[SATA13] Satan: You're welcome.
[SATA14] Satan: HEE HAHA HEEHee HAHAHA!

Room 15 – heaven

God: Hi Debra.
[SATA15] Satan: I had to, I promised.
Debra: I need you to help Timothy.
God: I know.
Debra: So you will?
God: No.
God: You can't undo what you did.
Debra: But, Timothy!
God: I don't even..
Debra: I'm trying to help him.
God: You can choose.
Debra: Choose what?
God: Go with me, or go to Timothy.
Debra: I choose Timothy.
[SATA16] Satan: Really? Uh.. okay, let's go.
[SATA17] Satan: It's not that bad. It's actually a lot like Earth.
